moves.10. Bxf4 O-O 11. O-O Bg4 12. Qd3 Bxf3: No particular need to exchange now
moves.13. Rxf3: White decides to retake with the rook and pile up on the f file
moves.15. Raf1 Ng6 16. Be3: Now white threatens to take on f7
moves.16... c5: There is not enough time for c5??
moves.19... dxe5: ...dxe?? loses outright, the only possibility for holding oon was nh8.
moves.20. Qxg6 Qg4 21. Rxg7+: Rxg7 ! White wins by taking the queen, but this is faster
